title: nee paadamulE gathiyani
sahitya:
nI pAdamulE gatiyani nammiti nIrajAkSi parAshakti 
(nI)

anupallavi

shrI pancanadIshvaruni rANi shrtajana pAlini
dharmasamvardini 
(nI)

caraNam

kAmita phaladAyaki kaumAri kAma dahanuni manOhari shankari O
mahAkALi sanAtani OmkAra sadani bhavAni sAmaja samagamani  sukhabhASiNi
sakala lOka janani pApashamani pAmara asura mada bhanjani parAtpari pAvani niranjani 
(nI)
